text: Tautovskoye Rural Settlement (; , Tavăt jal tărăkhĕ) is an administrativeIn accordance with Law #28, the municipal divisions in the Chuvash Republic are considered to be its administrative-territorial divisions and municipal division (a rural settlement) of Alikovsky District of the Chuvash Republic, Russia.Law #37 It is located in the central part of the district. Its administrative center is the locality (a village) of Tautovo. Rural settlement's population: 2,532 (2006 est.). Tautovskoye Rural Settlement comprises eleven rural localities. The Cheboksary–Krasnye Chetai highway crosses the territory of the rural settlement. ==References== ===Notes=== ===Sources=== * * ==Further reading== *L. A. Yefimov, "Alikovsky District" ("Элĕк Енĕ"), Alikovo, 1994. *"Аликовская энциклопедия" (Alikovsky District's Encyclopedia), authors: Yefimov L. A., Yefimov Ye. L., Ananyev A. A., Terentyev G. K. Cheboksary, 2009, . ==Other websites== *Official website of Tautovskoye Rural Settlement Category:Alikovsky District Category:Rural settlements of the Chuvash Republic
title: Tautovskoye Rural Settlement
